name: Wikipedia Minimalistic Style [Original]
description:
It's minimalistic and "flat" design for Wikipedia. Brand new, modern and enjoyable.

About all improvement suggestions, bug reports and the other please email me tosknn354@gmail.com
additional_info:
v2.01 - v2.1 (22 august 2015 - 29 august 2015) Some bugs are fixed, some changes.
v2.0 (21 august 2015) There are a lot of changes plus many bugs are fixed now. Enjoy ;)
--

v1.2 (12 august 2015) 'Arial' font, new design of headers, new menu.
v1.1 (26 may 2014) HTTPS support, new design of headers, some bugs are fixed.
v1.07 (04 may 2014) Links at the top of the page to geographical coordinates have been removed.
v1.06 (03 may 2014) Some elements' styles were changed.
v1.05 (21 april 2014) "The Red Links" have been returned.
v1.04 (19 april 2014) More thin fonts, some bugs are fixed.
v1.03 (18 april 2014) New design of block with code, new search input and others small changes.
v1.02 (08 april 2014) New button design, some bugs and issues are fixed
v1.01 (06 april 2014) Fixed some issues (you MUST update the style)
